sentences.en: A lubricant formulation to reduce wear and prolong die life is developed.
sentences.cn: 研制出了降低磨损,提高模具寿命的润滑剂配方.

sentences.en: Also the oxide itself is a moderately effective lubricant.
sentences.cn: 它的氧化物也是中等效能的润滑剂.

sentences.en: Demulsibility Property of a lubricant tO separate from water.
sentences.cn: 抗乳化性指润滑油与水分离的能力.

sentences.en: I think humor is a great lubricant for life.
sentences.cn: 我认为幽默是人生的上好润滑剂。

sentences.en: It also analyzes the application of this lubricant in the warm extrusion.
sentences.cn: 分析讨论了该润滑剂在温挤压中的应用.

sentences.en: Its nozzle was smeared with some kind of lubricant.
sentences.cn: 它的喷嘴抹了某种润滑油。

sentences.en: Kits include: Disc & Spring assembly, Cover O - ring and lubricant.
sentences.cn: 组件包括: 阀瓣 和 弹簧总成, 阀盖O形环和润滑剂.

sentences.en: Miewenying spray liquid, electric, car maintenance supplies, mechanical lubricant additives production, marketing.
sentences.cn: 灭蚊蝇喷液 、 蚊香 、 汽车维护用品 、 机械润滑添加剂的生产 、 销售.

sentences.en: Mineral oil: For use only in local application or for lubricant use.
sentences.cn: 矿物油: 仅限于作为局部涂敷或润滑之用.

sentences.en: Most mechanical devices require oil as a lubricant.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数机械装置都需要用油作为润滑剂。

sentences.en: NL - mud lubricant is an additive agent used in oil drilling.
sentences.cn: 泥浆润滑剂是应用于油田钻井的泥浆添加剂.

sentences.en: Pneumatic pipe without the use of booster pump lubricant.
sentences.cn: 气动管道增压泵无需使用润滑剂.

sentences.en: The category and function of the copper wire drawing lubricant are presented.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了铜拉丝润滑剂的种类、作用、对拉线的影响因素及质量要求.

sentences.en: The current research conditions of nano materials as lubricant additive were reviewed.
sentences.cn: 回顾了纳米材料作为润滑添加剂的研究状况.

sentences.en: You put lubricant on a wheel to make it turn more easily.
sentences.cn: 把润滑剂涂在轮子上使它转起来更零活一些。

润滑能力；不稳定（性）；狡猾；难以捉摸

润滑；涂油；起润滑剂作用

trans.tran_cn: 润滑剂，润滑油，能减少摩擦的东西，<俚>奶油，黄油
trans.tran_en: a substance such as oil that you put on surfaces that rub together, especially parts of a machine, in order to make them move smoothly and easily
